name: magento2-module-recaptcha-page-speed-improvement
description: The Collab_RecaptchaPageSpeedImprovement is a simple Magento 2 module which improves PageSpeed Insights score  by lazy loading reCaptcha script only after user interaction with the website. Loader is triggered after one  of the following events: - 'touchstart',  - 'mouseover',  - 'wheel',  - 'scroll',  - 'keydown'
